You gain Two-Weapon Fighting.

You can dual wield even if your weapons aren't Light, and you gain a +1 bonus to Armour Class while wielding a melee weapon in each hand. You cannot dual-wield Two-Handed weapons.

When wielding a melee weapon in each hand, you can attack with both weapons without consuming a bonus action, at the cost of a -3 penalty to the Attack Rolls. (You can toggle this on and off)

Focus on attacking with both weapons. Attacking with both weapons does not consume a <LSTag Tooltip="BonusAction">bonus action</LSTag>, at the cost of a -3 penalty to the <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>. (You can toggle this on and off)

You are focused on attacking with both weapons. While focused, attacking with both weapons does not consume a <LSTag Tooltip="BonusAction">bonus action</LSTag>, at the cost of a -3 <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> penalty.
<LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="DualWielder_Focus_Attack">Dual Wielding Master</LSTag> allows you to make an additional attack.
